description: This file defines a PaymentsService class responsible for processing payments via HTTP POST requests, utilizing the Dio package for network calls. It handles API interaction, error handling, and data parsing related to payments.

classes.name: PaymentsService
classes.description: A service class to handle payment processing through API calls.

methods.name: processPayment
methods.description: Asynchronously processes a payment for a booking using provided booking ID, amount, and payment method, and returns a Payment object upon success.

methods.name: _handleError
methods.description: Handles DioException errors by attempting to extract a message from the response data, or falling back to a generic error message.
